column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We serve more than a dozen different signature-ramen bowls
column2: and some are designed with thick noodles
column3: as opposed to thin noodles. Also
column4: you can always request thick over thin if that's your preference. And if you're ever dissatisfied with your meal for any reason
column5: we will always gladly remake your bowl or offer you something else that might better suit your palate.
